release_note: Correction: When exporting pictures the original title is not used and filename is used. Correction: The last note after automatically scrolling to the visible area during editing the head will jump after finishing editing. Optimization: A certain emerging input method in the desktop version will cause the automatic completion of list syntax to cancel the prefix. Adjustment: The original content is wrapped in YAML format to avoid confusion in the first line of key:value text. Correction of other details

Optimization: Adjust startup logic to improve startup speed Fixed: a potential performance issue when automatically hiding Markdown markup characters Correction: The pop up menu on the desktop side corresponds to OS 12 14 separately to avoid backward compatibility issues when corresponding to the latest OS. Correction of other details

The Mac version is compatible with the latest version of macOS The iOS version has been optimized to address performance issues caused by the latest version of iOS scrolling will cause lag . Optimization related to iCloud synchronization and increasing the display of iCloud Status Some compatibility fixes for lower versions of iOS Correction of other details

Integrate CloudKit with iCloudDrive or Git to improve the speed and stability of cross device synchronization 增加 Todo 型 list 的支持 相关快捷键为 Command D Fine tuning the data logic based on Tag related matching Correction of other details

We have redesigned DoMemo and added an independent native macOS version to maintain a consistent experience across iOS iPadOS and macOS. In addition the integration of CloudKit with iCloudDrive and Git improves the speed and stability of cross device synchronization.

Correction: Mechanism to prevent Meta information loss resulting in failure to completely delete Tags and bidirectional links Added: Support for Tag renaming long press on the sidebar Adjustment: Dark mode adaptive mechanism adjustment Adjustments: Some style adjustments Handling of other bugs and crash situations

Emergency repair: The new caching mechanism in the newly updated 1.2.0 will cause the loss of metadata such as the loss of Tags and reference paths. If this has happened the original content needs to be retrieved in the historical version. Enhancement: Added supplementary loading logic significantly improved scrolling performance Adjustment: Redesign the display mode of space list spaces can be renamed Enhancement: Enhancement of Git related logic and operations 增强: 搜索区域新增两项常驻 week 以及 month Bugfix: Avoid loading placeholder content of... from conflicting with local real content New: Added option to turn off click vibration feedback in settings 调整: 边栏的交互调整 增加一个自动的 search button Handling of other bugs and crash situations

Enhancement: Added supplementary loading logic significantly improved scrolling performance Adjustment: Redesign the display mode of space list spaces can be renamed Enhancement: Enhancement of Git related logic and operations 增强: 搜索区域新增两项常驻 week 以及 month Bugfix: Avoid loading placeholder content of... from conflicting with local real content New: Added option to turn off click vibration feedback in settings 调整: 边栏的交互调整 增加一个自动的 search button Handling of other bugs and crash situations
Some bug fixes and some code logic adjustments
Newly designed settings interface Other bug fixes

Fixed: In diary mode when re editing after deleting the day s notes the keyboard cannot pop up automatically. Correction: After deleting a note the number of notes for the day was not updated in the calendar interface in a timely manner. Optimization: In diary mode merge the selection of year and month Enhancement: Improve the real time performance of dark mode of automatic following system Fixed: There may be a crash when reloading data in iPadOS 15.4 and other versions. Some other bug fixes

Enhancement: Add transition effects when creating new notes to make the interaction more natural Enhancement: Performance of rendering during scrolling Enhancement: Thread safety of local information correlation query Correction: When exporting as a card type image the embedded image may be incompletely displayed horizontally missing 34 pixels of width. Enhancement: The candidate Tag area selects the recently used ones and the other ones are processed in descending order according to the corresponding number making selection more convenient. Adjustment: TagTree clicks when a node is expanded and collapses directly instead of asking for operation. Handling other bugs and crash situations

Fix: Under iOS 16 the safe area location information at the top is not updated and the top of the search bar is blocked and inoperable. Correction: When typing on the iPad version when a keyboard is connected the height of the note is not calculated and adjusted in time while the text spans across lines. Enhancement: The iPad version adds some shortcut keys for editing grammar Correction: When the iPad version is started if it is in dark mode the sidebar will be white for a moment. Adjustment: If it is a Git space an automatic synchronization attempt will be made when opening it. Enhancement: If the current note content is inconsistent with the actual storage when updating the UI synchronously it is forced to save the historical version first. Enhancement: When saving the current article further avoid being affected by deleted files synchronized by iCloud on other devices Adjustment: The prompt information after Git push is changed to Hud form Enhancement: Automatically merge redundant version conflicts generated by iCloud Drive to avoid some identical entries in the note list due to iCloud conflicts. Some other bug fixes

Adjustment: Adjust the spacing of the auxiliary column when inputting in the search area Fixed: When the label sidebar is displayed the names with the same number are sorted to avoid randomness. New: History summary of locally stored and recently edited notes Adjustment: Some interfaces are protected from being affected by custom fonts Optimization: Rewriting and organizing the structure of some logic at the code level Other bug fixes

Adjustment: Minimum compatible with iOS 13.0 Fixed: Incorrect switching of whether timestamp is displayed when switching timeline mode Fixed: The possible position of the cursor on the virtual character in timeline mode is not correct Correction: When a note on the current device has not been saved the content from other devices cannot be synchronized and only the historical version is stored. Correction: When displaying the name of the space it is automatically i18n Adjustment: Fine tuning the size of the new scroll button Adjustment: For notes created on iPad devices a device type tag is added to the file name path to minimize cross device conflict coverage. Adjustment: The iPhone version s Quickly enter writing mode default is changed to No Enhancement: Custom fonts are expanded from the original editing body area to other page elements Bugfix: Other bug fixes

Adjustment: Increase the synchronization detection frequency for iCloud Drive for notes within the current day Correction: After the notes in the recycle bin are restored in addition to the local corresponding storage restoration it is also updated to the local query database Correction: After restoring the historical version perform a synchronization update of the local database Correction: When restoring historical versions if the original file does not exist some operation clicks will be invalid. Some other bug fixes
